channel.title: Maybe this code will help someone?
channel.description:
Hello.. i've just scavenged up some code i found that i added in my old server... Maybe someone can put it to use?
[b]What does this code do? [/b] [i]It Checks if old mouse clicks equal the new one, to see if someone is repeatedly clicking same place which they'd do when autoing.[/i]
[b]Note:[/b] This isnt a tutorial so dont ask me where to add things! Im only posting that because i think it will help some people out with macroers and auto clickers!
[code] case 241: // mouse clicks - Divinity int mouseclick = inStream.readDWord(); /*if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Divinity")) System.out.println("Mouse clicks = "+mouseclick);*/ if(oldclick == mouseclick) // this checks if old mouse clicks equal the new one -Divinity sameclick += 1; else sameclick = 0; // resets because the click has changed -Divinity
oldclick = mouseclick;
break;[/code]
Second bit of the code is:
[code] public int oldclick = 0; public int sameclick = 0;[/code]
Thanks and dont leech this code.

item.title: Maybe this code will help someone?
item.dc:creator: @Divinity Divinity
item.description:
@Divinity wrote:

Hello… i’ve just scavenged up some code i found that i added in my old server…
Maybe someone can put it to use?

What does this code do? It Checks if old mouse clicks equal the new one, to see if someone is repeatedly clicking same place which they’d do when autoing.

Note: This isnt a tutorial so dont ask me where to add things! Im only posting that because i think it will help some people out with macroers and auto clickers!

[code] case 241: // mouse clicks - Divinity
int mouseclick = inStream.readDWord();
/if(playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Divinity”))
System.out.println("Mouse clicks = "+mouseclick);/
if(oldclick == mouseclick) // this checks if old mouse clicks equal the new one -Divinity
sameclick += 1;
else
sameclick = 0; // resets because the click has changed -Divinity

                            oldclick = mouseclick;

    				break;[/code]

Second bit of the code is:

public int oldclick = 0; public int sameclick = 0;

Thanks and dont leech this code.

Read full topic
item.source: Maybe this code will help someone?
